item.title: VBA IV: DRE
item.description: Simple automated MPS (Master Production Schedule) sheet with use of forms and VBA. Objetivo: Create an automated MPS System Requirements proper Webscrapping function will require the instalation of selenium and also cromedriver Functionalities: Product list with automatic ID generation and add/remove options Checks for minimum stock and minimum lot production Real time graph att allow use of both fix and variable lot options Know Bugs SAM not Functional as intended Inconsistency in VPL percentage input value Images
